name: Ramona Fegins-Lee
text: I'm super picky about whom I have work on my car, being a single mother for years I'm always looking for a fair price with quality work. This is the place to take your vehicle repairs. Father, Son business that gets it done right the first time! R.Lee...aka NurseMo

name: Stephanie Anderson
text: They were very helpful and polite

name: Brandi Marling
text: ONLY take our vehicles here. No doubt the most honest, reliable, and fair service in Shelby County. Would highly recommend.

name: Lance Moore
text: I've taken my car to Brown's for about two years for various maintenance and repair work.  I've told myself several times this will be my last time because I have had to take my car back for rework several times.  The last time I visited was the case.  They were suppose to repair my windshield reservoir from a blown tire.  After getting home I noticed the hose was missing from the reservoir to the wipers and no fluids in the tank.  I called the shop and told them they didn't fix it and they said there must be a hole in it.  Clearly they didn't do any work on the reservoir or even look at it.  I took it back again and they connected the hosing and told me I needed a new pump.  I probably needed a new pump, but I felt like this should have been told to me the first time.  If you're looking for a shop that can do general maintenance work use them.  The people are generally friendly, but be willing to take your car back if the problem isn't solved the first time.

name: Micah Collins
text: A trustworthy mechanic that knows there stuff is hard to find. Thankful I found this place. Give them a try. I doubt you will be disappointed.

name: Jeff Plummer
text: Simply put..."A breath of fresh air". They literally spent hours trying to identify a vibration I was experiencing with my truck. When they weren't confident they had found the exact problem they actually told me so. They gave me a set of recommendations on things I could do to rule out things it wasn't, and left the next steps up to me. Their recommendations ultimately guided me to the answer (Young tires that had failed). They had my vehicle in their shop multiple times, didn't actually fix anything, but they have me as a customer into the foreseeable future. For me, helping me find the answer is as valuable as being the answer.

resp.text:
Our team truly has the best interest of our customers in mind, Jeff, so you can always count on us for honest service! We appreciate you recognizing our efforts, and we hope you'll keep us in mind for future maintenance.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

text: Great service, fast, no problems on my jacked up truck since.

name: Tarrance L Scott Sr
text: Exceptional service and customer care. Knowledgeable and facility was immaculate.

resp.text:
We pride ourselves on offering exceptional service, Tarrance, so please know you can always count on us for this! Thank you for sharing your 5-star review.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Jacey B.
text:
I just want to start out by saying that the employees here all seem very genuine and caring, and they’re probably great with most vehicles. But do not bother taking any foreign vehicle to their shop that needs anything more than an oil change. I had a vehicle break down on me and took it here to avoid towing it to the dealership in Birmingham. I quickly received an estimate of almost $23,000 to fix my suv and was told that I should contact my insurance company because it was totaled.

I ended up taking it to the dealership for a second opinion (like I should have to begin with) and ended up only paying $3700 to repair what was wrong with my suv, and that didn’t include a single thing listed on the original estimate sent to me by CBA.

I really wish they would have just turned me away before I took it there in the first place if they could not service my vehicle instead of guessing what the problem was and writing it off as a lost cause.

I called CBA last week to update them on the status of my vehicle and to let them know what really was wrong with it - all they wanted to know was how “reputable the shop was that I took my vehicle to” and to try to tell me that they never referred to my car as totaled. Not only did they put us in a horrible situation, they also tried to act like they never said the things they did and asked what exactly I was expecting from my phone call. Just a bad experience.

resp.text: We apologize for your inconvenience, Jacey. Your feedback is appreciated, and we wish you well with all your future automotive repairs and services. Respectfully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: UpInTheAir
text:
I'd like to start off this review by saying that the folks at CBA Montgomery are incredibly polite and courteous. I have no disapproval towards the individual employees there.

With that said, that is unfortunately the extent of my positives about the business. I've brought two of my vehicles there a total of three times, over the course of two years, and each time, I have been disappointed. My first vehicle had a minor oil leak, and I took it to CBA to check it out. Long story short, they charged me over $1000 and a week of time, and in the end, the issue wasn't resolved. Brought my vehicle to another shop on Atl Highway, $250 later, and it was fixed. All in all, this wasn't a huge deal, but I was disappointed in CBA.

Fast forward 2 years, and i take another one of my vehicles that I had just purchased to CBA for a post-purchase full diagnosis (This alone cost $120) which they assured me would cover just about everything i needed to get done to the vehicle to get it to top shape. They quoted me over $5,000 worth of service. This alone wasn't completely insane. It was an older vehicle, and yes, a good few things needed fixing. However, I jotted down the items they told me I needed to replace and decided to do the items myself (brake change, coolant flush, oil change, filters, etc). Took off the brakes. The Pads, Rotors were literally brand new. They said my front caliper mount and caliper itself were in terrible condition. Completely false--it was in perfect condition upon further inspection. Performed the coolant change after they claimed it was dirty and needed changing (btw they quoted me $140 for the coolant change, which if you know, is one of the easiest things you can do yourself for $20 worth of coolant and 30 min of your time max). This also turned out to be unecessary. The coolant I drained was the exact same color as the new coolant I purchased myself. I did this for every item on the list of things they told me I needed to change, and the ONLY thing that actually needed to be changed was the front driver struts and the radiator fan.

A week after I get the $5000 list of things that need to be serviced, I drive to Atlanta. Halfway there on the interstate, my timing/fan belt shred apart, engine overheats, and my car is disabled. Tow it to a garage nearby and they inform me that my water pump was well on its way out, A/C compressor had imploded, and timing/fan belts should have been changed a long time ago. NONE OF THESE WERE MENTIONED BY CBA. Fortunately I did not get into an accident, but I trusted CBA to diagnose what I needed to fix on my vehicle, and they failed to mention, at all, three incredibly easy to inspect components that were failing, and caused my vehicle to stop driving in the middle of the highway. Absolutely unacceptable.

If you're reading this, CBA, come on, step your game up. If you're going to charge one of the highest rates in the entire state of Alabama, maybe provide service that backs up that rate. I respect you all as individuals, but  as a "reputable automotive service center", I am appalled.

resp.text: We take your detailed feedback seriously, as our customers' safety and satisfaction are very important to us. However, we are unable to find your information in our database so there is a chance you have left this for the wrong business. Please allow us an opportunity to address your concerns in detail by sending your phone number and availability to Eric.Wesch@cbauto.net. Thank you for your time, and we hope to hear from you soon. Respectfully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Joshua Hopkins
text: Christian Brothers Automotive not only replaced my breaks fast but helped me get to and from work while they fixed my car.

resp.text: We truly care about you, Joshua, so please count on us to always provide you with prompt and helpful service! Thank you for your business, and we'll see you next time. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Kent Rose
text:
Very pleasant, accomodating,
And timely.

resp.text: We aim to deliver accommodating and prompt service, Kent, so thank you for letting us know that we hit the mark during your visit. We welcome you to continue returning when you need assistance! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Justin West
text: My wife has a handicapped van. When we took it to them it needed new brakes and two front tires. Well we gave the manager the rundown on how to operate the van along with two phone numbers. Well a week later they called to say the brakes were fine and the van still needs 100 yrds. to stop the front tires they said were fine and you can almost see the wires. So just because they could not operate it they turned us away.

resp.text: We strive to provide our customers with honest and helpful service, Justin, and it saddens us to read of your disappointment with our efforts. We welcome you to send your phone number and availability to danny.spisak@cbauto.net, so we can review your visit with you. Thank you for your time and communication. Respectfully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Angie Leonard
text: Coming from Atlanta, our alternator went out in our van. Due to the fact that we were 45 minutes away, we had to call a tow truck. We were taken to the above named place where we were charged about $800 for a brand new alternator, which came with a year warranty. My husband knew they were overcharging us, but we had to get home. Well, it hasn't been close to a year and that brand new alternator went out. My husband took it to a local shop here in Louisiana to get rebuilt only to find out that the alternator was rebuilt when we bought it from Christian Brothers Automotive. That's a horrible thing to do to people that are stranded.  Very Christian of you all.

resp.text: Thank you for expressing your concern, Angie. We would welcome the opportunity to discuss your and your husband's experience and to ensure your feedback is addressed, so kindly reach out to us at danny.spisak@cbauto.net, with a note including your phone number and availability. Your communication is appreciated, and we look forward to speaking with you both. Respectfully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Goddess Tai
text: I came to this shop in distress and with no hope of getting back on the road. Being  a single mother who works full time, Danny and the team made it priority to get me going with no issues. Danny made sure I was ok and helped me tremendously. This company cares for the people and understands the struggle people encounter with cars. You will keep going back because they are warm, inviting, and proficient in what they do. I am forever a Christian Brothers Automotive supporter. You guys are STELLAR!!

resp.text:
LaTaisha, we are incredibly honored by your high praise! Our team is truly passionate about what we do, which is why we'll always go above and beyond to exceed our customers' expectations. Thank you for writing such a wonderful review!
Gratefully,  Christian Brothers Automotive - Montgomery

name: Nancy Saffo
text: CB is a company you can trust to tell you what's really wrong with your car especially if you're a woman. Sometimes auto repair company's will take a woman bringing in a car as the time to tell you lies about your needed repairs!! Not at CB and I especially appreciate that . They also go above and beyond to make sure you are satisfied with your car if they should do the repairs. Thank you to the great staff at this location!!!! Nancy Saffo 😁💖

resp.text:
Your thoughtful comments mean a great deal to our team, Nancy, as we make every effort to provide honest service. Thank you for coming online to show your appreciation, and please know that we'll be here for you if you need anything in the future. Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Boz Bowles
text:
We were on the first day of a vacation when a car problem hit us about 6 hours into our drive. With our budget in shambles, and this family of 4 genuinely stuck, Chad and Brie managed to find a hotel for us and helped keep our costs as minimal as possible. They were beyond friendly, and they seemed genuinely interested in helping. We are back underway, and all we can say is that we wish their shop was close to our home. We'd never go anywhere else
I'd give them 500 stars if I could.

resp.text: It was an honor to be there for you and your family, Boz, as our team understands the importance of reliable and helpful service! Thank you so much for your patronage and for setting aside some time to share your experience! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Coty Hall
text: Stopped by early for a strange noise coming from a wheel well, hadn't been in before and was prepared to throw myself at their mercy as I had a road trip for work the next day. They took a look at it right then and it turned out to be a simple fix. They took care of me and didn't try to pressure me for a sale. I will be back

resp.text: We understand the importance of dependable and helpful service, Coty, which is why we love providing our customers with precisely this! We're blessed to have earned your perfect rating, and we cannot wait for your return! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Hunter J
text: I am very disappointed with how christian brothers does their service. I went to them to diagnose the problem with my Toyota Tacoma, they charged me $120 for a diagnostic. They drove my truck down the block and red lined it all the way back. Then after getting back said they can’t give a proper diagnosis since I had no exhaust on my truck because it was straight piped. Turned out to be a vacuum leak that I had fixed by another shop and they charged me nothing since it was just a loose hose. While they were doing my “diagnosis” as well they were trying to  charge a guy $1200 to fix a simple fuel pump on a tahoe. Ended up taking his tahoe to my house and got him driving again for only 200 dollars. Do not recommend this place if your in an emergency and trying to just get home.

resp.text: We are disappointed to receive your feedback, Hunter; however, we've done a thorough search of our database and are unable to find your and your vehicle's information. So we can personally review your visit with you and ensure your concerns are addressed, kindly send your phone number and availability to danny.spisak@cbauto.net. Thank you. Respectfully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Scott P
text: The most professional and honest shop I have EVER been to.  Thank you!!!

resp.text: You're very welcome, Scott, and thank you for your glowing review! It's fantastic that you appreciated the professionalism and honesty our team offered, and if we can lend a hand with anything else, please don't hesitate to let us know. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Brandon Adams
text: I had a wonderful experience doing service with “Christian Automotive”. They were very professional and manner-able. Ms. Lily & Mr. Chad were my primary contacts while at the facility. They gave the best customer service you could ask for. They are amazing and deserve more recognition.

resp.text:
Your kind recognition is greatly appreciated, Brandon! It was an honor to be entrusted to care for your vehicle, and we cannot thank you enough for taking the time to share your positive feedback.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Tyler Oswald
text: I had a wonderful experience doing business with Christian Brothers. The staff is excellent and I have received quality work on my car multiple times! I highly recommend this business for all car needs!

resp.text:
We're thrilled to hear of your wonderful experience, Tyler! Your ongoing loyalty is something that we truly treasure, and our team looks forward to your future visits.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Vicky Smith
text: Danny and Jon at Christian Brothers Automotive in Montgomery Alabama were the absolute best! They assured me that they could get my car back up and running in order to finish my trip back to Dayton Ohio. They went above and beyond what I even expected. I highly recommend this business. Service technicians were professional fast and thorough and customer service managers Danny and John made me feel like I had no worries.

resp.text: Here at Christian Brothers, we want our customers to know that we truly care about them, which is why we provide nothing but above and beyond care. Knowing you will be safe on the road is what matters most to us, Vicky, and thank you for the high recommendation on Google! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: vanessa jones
text: Very friendly. Did a great job on my vehicle. Shuttle service was great.

resp.text: Thank you for validating our efforts, Vanessa, as earning your full satisfaction and support was our goal! We're blessed to have you as our customer, and we'll see you next time! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Frederic Guenette
text: Arrived at 17:30 (closing at 18:00) needing an oil change and battery change (which just failed, needed a boost to start). Mentioned we were leaving on a trip the next morning. Our car was picked up at 8:30 the next morning....simply amazing.

resp.text: We're thrilled to hear our team provided such accommodating and friendly service, Frederic! Thank you for coming online to validate our efforts, and please don't hesitate to give us a call whenever you're in need of care. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Ben Huh
text: Two thumbs up!!! It was my first time but I'm so touched by so many things at the shop. Really customer-oriented shop!! Danny and Bob are awesome! Thank you Danny for even dropping me at my workplace! Hope many other companies would follow your kind, compassionate work ethics. I'm a regular customer now!!!

resp.text:
Ben, we're so lucky to have you as our customer. Our team is overjoyed to receive such excellent compliments, and we look forward to assisting you again!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Dan Bradfield
text:
Excellent service from the team at Christian Brothers. This is our new “go to” mechanic in Montgomery.

I stopped in for a brake inspection and what I thought it needed was new brake pads. Instead of just changing them or telling me they did need to be changed, the team identified that they were still very good and didn’t need hanging saving me several hundred dollars.

Very honest and reliable team. We will return.

resp.text:
Dan, we're honored to be your new "go to"! Honest, reliable service is exactly what our customers deserve, so we're ecstatic to hear that this is what you received. Our team enjoyed serving you, and we hope you'll let us know the next time we can be of assistance!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Jason Kitch
text: A Totally different experience. Treated like they actually care. Professional, friendly atmosphere, nice waiting area with free drinks..if your like me and are weary of being ripped off..... This an honest Trustworthy business. I Highly recommend Christian Brothers!!!

resp.text: We care a great deal about our customers, Jason, and we're overjoyed that you noticed! Thank you for placing your trust in us, and for your 5-star recommendation! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Jay Ruhnke
text:
1. $30 cheaper than anywhere else,
2. Military discount,
3. They have my 2 and 3 year old boys organic apple juice and offered me a bottled water, and
4. We received a courtesy ride to get some shopping in while they worked on my car!

This place is the best. High quality brand name oil and filters for an amazing price and thank you for the military discount!

resp.text: You are welcome, Jay! We are delighted to read about all of the things you appreciated most about our Christian Brothers. Going out of our way to ensure you are taken care of is our goal, and please know we enjoyed working with you. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Ghst Image
text:
I am a skeptical person when it comes to dealing with auto mechanics, always thinking they will try and rip you off with unnecessary repairs just to get your money. Thankfully, that is not the case with Christian Brothers...I cannot praise them enough with how me and my family have been treated. From great customer service, with a smile I might add, to the actual mechanics work, and pricing of said work done. You just can't go wrong bringing your vehicle here. If I could give them 10 gold stars, I would. I've found my trusted auto mechanics team.

Ken H.

resp.text:
Ken, it means the world to us to hear that we have earned your trust! Thank you so much for your 10 gold stars, and please know that we are excited to serve you for many miles to come.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Thad Wright
text: Personable. Went out of their way to help us in our situation. Staff super friendly. Had snacks and books for the kids. Also, its clean. It made the waiting area warm and welcoming.

resp.text:
A warm and welcoming waiting area is just one way we show appreciation for our customers, Thad! Thank you for allowing us to serve you, and for sharing such a glowing review. We're thankful for your support!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Ben Huh
text: Two thumbs up!!! It was my first time but I'm so touched by so many things at the shop. Really customer-oriented shop!! Danny and Bob are awesome! Thank you Danny for even dropping me at my workplace! Hope many other companies would follow your kind, compassionate work ethics. I'm a regular customer now!!!

resp.text:
Ben, we're so lucky to have you as our customer. Our team is overjoyed to receive such excellent compliments, and we look forward to assisting you again!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Jami White
text: The owner personally drove with me in the passenger seat as I described the problem my car had been having. He also drove after to make sure the problem had been fixed. The prices were great as well.

resp.text:
It was a pleasure getting to know you,  Jami! Thank you for choosing our shop, and please feel free to reach out to us anytime your vehicle can benefit from our attention.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Kimberly Miller
text: Great people to trust your vehicle with!  Wonderful service every time, and I know I am getting quality work done my vehicle.  T

resp.text:
We want our customers to always feel confident that their vehicles are in good hands here, Kimberly, and it's terrific to read that this has been the case! Your ongoing loyalty is deeply appreciated, as well as the generous feedback you've shared.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Thad Wright
text: Personable. Went out of their way to help us in our situation. Staff super friendly. Had snacks and books for the kids. Also, its clean. It made the waiting area warm and welcoming.

resp.text:
A warm and welcoming waiting area is just one way we show appreciation for our customers, Thad! Thank you for allowing us to serve you, and for sharing such a glowing review. We're thankful for your support!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Yolonda Card
text: Service and customer service are phenomenal! Reasonable prices!

name: Gene Homan
text:
Imagine being on your way back from vacation and having your radiator die on your car. That's what happened to us. Luckily we were close to Christian Brothers in Montgomery, AL. Danny and Chad went above and beyond to get us fixed and back on the road in record time. Kind, courteous and understanding don't even begin to describe the CBA team.   ABOVE AND BEYOND!  (Plus some!)

Thank you so much to the whole team at Christian Brothers. We didn't want to break down, but since we did, we're glad we were near you!

resp.text:
We know how stressful it can be to experience car trouble while traveling, Gene, so it was our pleasure to help get you back on the road in record time! If you ever find yourself in the area again and in need of our assistance, please don't hesitate to call on us.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Travis Brown
text: Prices are high. I live around the corner and find myself calling Christian Brothers every time I’m in need of service and am quickly reminded that with a few phone calls you can find service much cheaper! Service is great just really high prices. I find lower prices all over town and when I tell them “that’s high” over the phone they tell me....” I won’t find a better price” wellllllll I do. The “nice” factor is great but I’d rather have competitive prices.

resp.text: Travis, I am truly sorry that we failed to meet your needs in the pricing of our services. We take pride in everything we do although I can not speak to the services and pricing of other repair facilities. Our expectation is to offer premium quality services accompanied with our Nice Difference Warranty which is a 2 year or 24,000 mile warranty on all our repairs. Again I am sorry we were unable to meet your expectations but if there's anything we can do for you in the future please let us know.

name: jason kitchens
text: Fantastic customer service and I actually trusted them. The guy in the office, sorry forgot his name but he's very personable and seems to be straight up when he's talking with you. No BS!

resp.text:
Thank you so much, Jason! You can always expect our team to provide straightforward communication, as our mission is built on honesty and integrity. We appreciate you taking a moment to share your compliments, and we look forward to your next visit!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Kendrea Adams
text: Good service!! They took me right in after the Mercedes dealership said they couldn’t check my car to tell me what’s wrong until a week or so later. I actually got my car a day ahead of time.

resp.text:
Kendrea, we aim to deliver nothing short of the best service possible, and we appreciate the opportunity to serve you. Please let us know if you ever need our assistance in the future.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Terry Phillips
text: My a/c had stopped cooling and it could have cost a thousand to fix. They tried recharged the system and it works great.

resp.text:
Terry, we sure appreciate the opportunity to gain your trust on your car. Doing everything with complete honesty and transparency is what we are all about. Your willingness to share your experience helps us grow!

Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Doris Lee
text: I highly recommend you come here to get your car fixed for any problems you may have with it. The people are so nice and don't have a problem with giving. I had a great experience here, so you should come and have a great experience it too.

resp.text: Doris, we pride ourselves on the nice differences that set us apart, and it's so amazing to read that you truly enjoyed them. Your glowing recommendation is deeply appreciated, and we thank you for sharing! Gratefullly, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Elaine Arendsen
text: This place takes such good care of their customers!  My car window stopped working on a Friday morning.  They not only did their best to get it fixed, but also listened and took care of me while I waited.  They truly care not only about taking care of your car, but you as a person.

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words, Elaine! We want to make sure you are comfortable and at ease as your vehicle is being worked on, and a welcoming environment is what we want to provide. Our team is glad to have been able to help, and we hope to serve you again. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Tion S
text: I took my vehicle their and was charged about $400 dollars just for diagnostic work.They then tell me my total bill to fix and program my BCM(Body Control Module) would be $1900 dollars! Ended up taking my vehicle to Gray's Automotive and they fixed it for about 1k less! I just feel they take unnecessary advantage of people and use God as a front. And that's the honest to God truth!

resp.text:
Tion, we are sorry to hear that you didn't find value in our work and 2 year or 24,000 mile Nice Difference warranty. Our aim is to ensure our customers receive exceptional care, and that their vehicles receive high-quality work. Although we're glad to hear that you found a resolution, we would be grateful for the opportunity to speak further with you and address your concerns. If you would be open to this, please send your phone number and availability to Danny.Spisak@cbauto.net, and a member of our team will give you a call. Thank you very much for your business and feedback.
Respectfully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Gayle Ochs
text: Excellent mechanical work. Replaced engine on a Chrysler 300. Runs great. They called around to get the best deal for us. Service with a smile!!

resp.text:
Gayle, service with a smile is what we aim to always provide, so it's wonderful to know that this is what you received! Thank you for sharing such a kind review. We're glad to hear that your Chrysler 300 is running great, and we hope you'll let us know if there is anything that we can assist you with in the future!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: William Walker
text: I have been a customer at Christian Brothers for over 3 years.  Excellent service is rendered in a timely manner.  The pricing is very competitive.  I highly recommend Christian Brothers for all of your automotive service,

resp.text: Your high recommendation on Google means a lot to our team, William, and it has been a true pleasure serving you these past 3 years. Thank you very much for your support, and we look forward to serving you more in the future. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Tim Babb
text: Awesome service, truck was in and out in no time and did a beautiful job on the all wheel alignment!!! Truck was pulling hard to the left and now it’s drives straight as an arrow! Will definitely be coming back to them! Thanks again!!!!

resp.text:
Tim, we're pleased to hear that your truck is driving as straight as an arrow! We appreciate the opportunity to be there for you,  and we're thankful that you took the time to share such kind feedback. Our team is delighted to know you'll be back!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Debi Turner
text: I highly recommend this shop. Owner and staff very professional,  accomodating, and knowledgeable. I won't go anywhere else.

resp.text:
Debi, your glowing recommendation is appreciated by everyone here! It's a privilege to help you care for your vehicle, and we look forward to seeing you at your next visit.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Aleahta Burnette
text: They are a very family oriented business. My first experience will not be my last. Great customer service as well. I highly recommend them for your automotive needs.Thanks so much for all your help getting my truck in tip top!

resp.text: We care about all of our customers, and we only want what is best for them. It's wonderful we have earned your trust on your first visit, Aleahta, and that you will be returning for more excellent service. Thank you for your business as well as your wonderful review. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Matthew Sokoloski
text: I have taken my vehicles here several times recently. I believe the newer management is honest and passionate. They have a comfortable place to wait if needed and I like that I can schedule my oil changes here. Much better than trying to get to WalMart first thing in the morning.

resp.text: Your review and support mean a lot to us, Matthew. We will continue to uphold the great service we are known for, and our team looks forward to serving you again next time. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Darrell Rigsby
text: Great places for a post work drink!

name: Toni-Anton Taite
text: My first time getting my car fixed was such a pleasant experience!! My tires were deflated. The staff was friendly and very helpful! They got the job done just in time for classes 💪🏼

name: Elaine Arendsen
text: This place takes such good care of their customers!  My car window stopped working on a Friday morning.  They not only did their best to get it fixed, but also listened and took care of me while I waited.  They truly care not only about taking care of your car, but you as a person.

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words, Elaine! We want to make sure you are comfortable and at ease as your vehicle is being worked on, and a welcoming environment is what we want to provide. Our team is glad to have been able to help, and we hope to serve you again. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: M Suthy
text: It's terrible when your car breaks down and strands you but it's really nice to find a place like Christian Brothers especially when they make such a bad thing seam great. Excellent Service and Great Employees! I would definitely recommend this place to everyone!

resp.text: We certainly would never want you to be stranded if your car broke down, which is why we will always be there to help whenever you're in need! Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we can't wait to serve you again in the future. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Marqus R
text: The staff and technicians were very professional and courteous. I had an oil leak that a previous vendor caused days before and not only did they take care of it, but helped keep me covered in the case that future damage is done. Above/beyond what is expected and highly recommended!

resp.text: We believe our customers deserve above and beyond care, Marqus, which is why we were more than happy to help you with your leak. Our team appreciates you choosing our Christian Brothers, and please be sure to let us know if you're ever in need of anything else in the future. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Darrell Rigsby
text: Great places for a post work drink!

name: Cheryl Springer
text: I have been satisfied with the service i have had done ...so much so, that two other family members also have their vehicles serviced here.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for allowing us to service your vehicle, Cheryl, and for sending your family members our way! It brightens our day to hear of your satisfaction, and we look forward to seeing you the next time you need assistance.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Tyler Vittetoe
text: Love this place! I live close to the shop and have taken my cars there about a dozen times with varying issues. Not only have they been fantastic with my vehicles, but they are also top notch on customer support, convenience, and honesty. Car trouble is very stressful for me, but the folks at CBAC really help me feel relieved when I know they will shoot straight with me without trying to gimmick me in unnecessary repairs. I always recommend it to friends and people in my church!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing the love you have for our Christian Brothers, Tyler! We want you to leave the stress behind when it comes to your automotive maintenance, so we're glad you felt relieved knowing we would provide you with the honest service you deserve. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Rachel Evjen
text: Absolutely amazing service. Danny and John always take care of my car. They genuinely care about you, your wallet, and your car. They are the only place in town that I trust to do anything.

resp.text: You're right! We genuinely care about all of our wonderful customers, Rachel. Thank you for your trust! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Jonathan Harker
text:
This used to be a quality auto repair shop. The staff were courteous and knowledgeable. The mechanics were honest. I think the previous owners sold the business. The new ownership has not upheld the high standards of the previous owners.

Case in point: I had the 100k mile service done on my car, including replacement of the timing belt and all the  other drive belts. Shortly thereafter, I took the car in for an oil change and tire rotation. When they called me back they suggested that my belts were worn and needed replacement. I no longer trust these mechanics and will be getting work done elsewhere from now on.

resp.text: Jonathan, the complete satisfaction of our customers is very important to us, so it saddens us to read you feel this way. However, our team is a little confused as we can’t find any record of you on file, but we would like to help in any way we can. Kindly email your contact information and a note of your availability to cary.cain@christianbrothersauto.com, so we can speak to you further and hopefully clear up this confusion. Thank you. Respectfully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Spectromagic Guy
text: We had the best experience with Christian Brothers. Very understanding, and give you the best help possible. You know exactly what they are going to do before they get to work

resp.text: It brings our team joy to read you had the best experience with us, Jason, and thank you for your online support! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Cake Diva
text: Very nice location.  The guys there are so patient and helpful especially the manager with glasses lol can't remember his name but they do take time to see what's going on.

resp.text:
Thank you for sharing your 5-star review! Our team truly enjoyed assisting you, and please be sure to let us know when we can serve you again.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: S. Michelle
text: I always love CBA. They are fast and get the job done. They know what they are doing, and keep you informed. They are the only people that i trust with my car, and will continue to be so. I am constantly recommending people to go to CBA, and i will continue doing so!

resp.text:
Michelle, thank you so much for your confidence in us, as we are honored for the opportunity to serve you! We appreciate the trust you have placed in us, and we look forward to continuing doing business with you for many more miles down the road.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Shayla Gillard
text: On vacation with my family,and we got a nail in our tire.We needed someplace quick and easy to get it plugged and we were referred to Christian brothers automotive, and it was the best decision we made!If you need someplace that will show you the love of God and paying it forward,go here!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us, Shayla! It makes us so proud to have earned your 5-stars, and we're truly blessed to have you as our customer. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Stuart Loch
text: The work was carefully done and to a very high standard. I would definitely recommend to others.

resp.text:
Thank you for praising the quality of our work, Stuart! We believe that our customers deserve the very best, and it's fantastic to learn that we've earned your recommendation. We'll see you at your next visit!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Stuart Loch Ed
text: The service was great and the work was very carefully done.

resp.text:
We're elated you were pleased with the work completed at our shop, Stuart. We believe our customers deserve nothing but quality and reliable service, so it's wonderful to know that's exactly what our team delivered. Thank you for your support in person and on Google!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Dustin Maines
text: Outstanding service and will go thay extra mile to make you happy. I highly recommend them. Trust me you want be sorry if you did. They have my bussness for life.

resp.text:
It's such an honor to hear that we've earned your repeat business, Dustin! Our team truly appreciates your outstanding review, so thank you very much for taking the time to share it.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Echo McQueen
text:
There are not enough stars to rate this company.
2 weeks ago my car broke down, following a long string of misfortunes, I felt utterly hopeless and on the verge of just giving up. I came across the number to CBA while trying to find a repair shop that could quote me less than the few $1000 I had already been quoted by another. CBA was the only other shop I called, as soon as Danny answered my call he said he knew he had to help me, not to worry, they would do everything they could to get me through this. He did. He helped me get it towed from Prattville to their shop in Montgomery. Kept me updated every step of the way and constantly reassured me that they were there to help. My car, unfortunately, had some very major issues and even at CBA prices still was out of my price range. But, I didn't leave without transportation. Danny went above and beyond to help me find a suitable vehicle that I could afford and I left yesterday the owner of a reliable, running vehicle. The people of CBA are some of the kindest people I have had the blessing of meeting. They are truly doing works that reflect the epitome of Christians. Neither my family nor I will never not take a vehicle anywhere else other than Christian Brothers Automotive.
Thank you Danny and all the staff at CBA! I am forever grateful.

resp.text:
Being there for our customers when they need us is something our team takes great pride in, and it was truly our pleasure to be of help to you. Thank you very much for taking the time to share your great experience and acknowledge the diligent efforts of our team, and please know you can expect the same above and beyond service from us in the future.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Jaela J.
text: These guys are awesome and very kind hearted people! Quick, easy and sometimes offer free service to the less fortunate!

resp.text:
Thank you for sharing such a kind message, Jaela! We hope you'll let us know if there is anything we can assist you with in the future.
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Yvonne White
text: When I checked the reviews on Christian Brothers Automotive, I was confused by the contrast between the very bad reviews and the great reviews.  My Accord needed an oil change, and since I drive by CBA all the time decided to take a chance.  I learned they are now under new management, determined to correct the previous bad impressions.  I found the facility to be immaculate, especially the waiting area, which was bright and clean, very homey and comfortable.  The service was faultless, quick and efficient, friendly and helpful.  I felt they really cared about me and my car, which is important to me as a Senior.  The office manager was a delight--we had a great visit.  I'll definitely look forward to my next visit.

resp.text: You’re right, Yvonne, we DO care about you and your vehicle! Our team works hard to give the very best care to all our wonderful customers, which is why it brings us great joy to learn that you found our facility to be immaculate and our service faultless. Thank you so much for the fantastic review, and we look forward to seeing you again too! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: john Jones
text: Once you do business here you'll never want to go to another automotive shop. Honest, friendly, pleasant environment. Top of the line!!

resp.text: You deserve nothing less than honest and friendly service, John, and our team is honored that you have continued to choose Christian Brothers for your auto care! Thanks for the wonderful review! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Montgomery Alabama
text: My estimate was exorbitant  but I am not surprised based on the location. Price gouging brothers

resp.text: It saddens us to know you feel this way, as we always want our customers to find great value in our knowledgeable and helpful care. Please keep in mind that our skilled technicians only use quality brand parts that are backed by our 2 year or 24,000 mile warranty. So we can personally address your concerns, kindly send your best contact information and availability to danny.spisak@cbauto.net. Thank you. Respectfully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Rebecca Burson
text: I was truly impressed, the service was absolutely wonderful, and they were actually telling me I didn't need to have stuff done, which saved me money. I would highly recommend going back to this place, and I'm so glad is just right up the street.

resp.text: We are glad we are right up the street from you as well, Rebecca, and to know you were truly impressed with our care! Thank you for your wonderful recommendation! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Nevando Lopez
text: Nothing but the worst.....they dont care about their customers I was without a car for a week and when i called to check on it the B** who works in the office kept telling me they would call me back later on this afternoon and i never heard from them , everyday they had an excuse and always kept telling me that they should have it ready by today and then I never heard from them  or to call tomorrow  and I was the one that kept calling them ( the costumer should not be in charge of keeping in contact ...save your time and money and go else where because there aint nothing christian like or godly about this place and the prices ridiculous!!! I paid about at least 3000$ with this company and was without a car for a week because they had it in their shop for my car to break down not even a month later with the same problem ....I  wish giving stars was not even an option for this review

resp.text: Our team is disappointed to read your review, Nevando, as what you describe does not align with our high standards of attentive and professional automotive care. Please offer us the opportunity to speak with you further about your concerns, by emailing your contact information to cary.cain@christianbrothersauto.com. Thank you, and we look forward to hearing from you. Respectfully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Travis McGough
text: I needed a tire plugged on our minivan, and they were able to get me in and out in less than 30 minutes. The staff was also very friendly. No issues with the tire since.

resp.text: You are welcome, Travis! We are glad we could get you back on the road in a timely manner. Thanks for stopping by! Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: John Doe
text: They overpriced my by $2k then offered a  discount that's was still $1k higher than what it should have been. Always get a second opinion because they will bill you unnecessarily and offer to do work that isn't needed.

resp.text:
John, we're saddened to hear that you didn't find value in our services. As it's important to us to stand behind our work, we only use quality brand parts that are backed by our 2 year or 24,000 mile warranty. We would welcome the opportunity to review your experience in detail, so we ask that you kindly send your contact information to Danny.Spisak@cbauto.net in order for us to reach out. Your honest feedback is valued, and we hope to connect with you soon.
Respectfully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

text: These guys are amazing! I will definitely be a repeat customer! Great business ethics and attitudes!

We're committed to providing our customers with work that is guaranteed, so our skilled technicians only use quality brand parts that are backed by our 2 year or 24,000 mile warranty. We believe this adds significant value to our work, and we hope you'll consider us for your future automotive needs!
Gratefully,
Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Jonathan Beha
text: It took them $300 worth of "labor" to "diagnose" a weak battery in my wife's Subaru. They then installed a new $125 battery without giving us an estimate or any kind of statement of work. To top it off, they left a pile of fast food wrappers on the passenger seat for us to clean up when we picked up the car. A real class act.

name: David Traywick
text: Broke down traveling to NC- catastrophic front end failure of bearings,brakes,rotor,lines,abs sensor,pads- AAA recommended this shop and boy am I glad- took me right in,diagnosed,parts ordered,delivered,2 mechanics jumped on it,manager poured my coffee,FIXED, in less tha 3 hours!!!! Honest price! Friendly staff! Expert mechanics! In a word- Professional!  Wish they had one where I live!!

resp.text: David, our team is happy you were recommended to us, as we always want to make sure our customers' vehicles are safe to drive. We were happy to be there for you when you broke down, and thank you very much for the amazing review. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

text: Mr. Danny Spisak provide first class customer service for my Aunt Coach Johnson today, she said everyone was friendly, helpful and took excellent care of all her needs. This company deserves more than 5 stars. My Aunt doesn’t have a gmail so I relayed the message. Special thanks to all the team at Christain Brothers! 🙏🏾💯

resp.text: You are welcome, Cherea, and we were more than happy to help your aunt! We appreciate your special thanks to our team, and please let us know if you or your family ever need anything else in the future. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

name: Keith Poche
text: Horrible service. I called them at 10:30 am to schedule a time to bring my vehicle in for an oil change. They told me to be there at 1:00 pm. I was there 10 minutes early. Finally after waiting a hour. They tell me they don't have have the oil filter to change my oil.

name: Joe Florida
text:
The name of this place really bothers me, and reminds me of the money changers in the temple. They are just using "Christian Brothers" for marketing purposes, not to show a genuine Christian nature. I went in for an alternator swap. I knew it was the alternator and told them as much; didn't stop them from charging me $48 to "diagnose" the problem. That was for an half hour of labor which if you want to count the time it took for them to tell me the price, was not a half hour after I brought it in. So yes, their hourly labor rate is $96 which strikes me as a little high, and yes, they don’t mind rounding up to the detriment of the customer. The rest of the bill was just as offensive and out of tune with normal auto repair prices. A re-manufactured alternator for my car was $117 at the time, they charged $244.20 and kept the core fee for themselves. No, they didn't put a new one in, just a re-man. They then charged me $39.78 for a serpentine belt, which I don't mind that they replaced, but a new one at any auto parts store runs around $20. So paying twice for parts is pretty painful, but then they add on a fee for "shop supplies"; I'm not sure what for, wear and tear on the tools? A paper towel or two? Whatever they were, they cost me $37.10. You'd think that "shop supplies" would be included when you pay premium for the parts and labor. On top of all of that, they padded the hours they were replacing the alternator. They charged me for 1.5 hours ($144.09) but the guy was only working on it for 45 minutes tops. The rest of the time that it was in their garage it just sat there. That's right, a car in Christian Brothers Automotive's garage is accruing labor costs even if it just sits there, hate to see what the overnight tab would be. Just think of the “shop supplies” that leaked into a car that sat there overnight.

They have three salesman upfront and only two technicians when I was there. This shows their focus: extract every possible penny from a potential customer, especially if he is from out of town. Why pay extra techs when you are still billing for the time that the car sits in their garage right? Another indication of their less-than-honest nature is that they put all these odd-ball prices on the parts and shop fees. Like what is with the 10 cents on shop supplies, they couldn't round that off? Well they could, but they don't want you to realize that they are just padding the bill. Ten cents looks more authentic. They also have a sign in the back that says: "Ask every customer: Is there anything else we can check for you today?" I'd hate to see the proposal for work you get back when you give these guys a greenlight to check out your entire car.

The technicians were good, the alternator seems to be working out fine. But the salesmen are only good at small talk. They brought my car back out of the garage and it started to smoke. They thought the engine was about to explode or something they turn it off and frantically check the oil. When I get out there they say that the oil pan is empty. Nope, check again. When they checked again they saw that it was half full like I knew it was. The smoke was from the debris that got knocked down onto the serpentine belt. Some debris that my $37.10 in shop supplies should have cleaned up. Guess not.

All-in-all, I paid $545 for a pretty simple fix, and they quoted me on the phone $250 as I was driving trying to get somewhere before my car died. I guess they knew they had me, but I hope this review saves somebody else the expense and frustration of dealing with these guys. These guys bend you over with a smile on their face. If you want this type of service and pay these type of prices, just go to the dealer, at least they are more knowledgeable about your car.

name: Barbara Eaves
text: The price is good and they are quick and do the job correctly the first time

resp.text: Thanks for the positive feedback, Barbara! Our team really appreciates it, and we'll see you again next time. Gratefully, Christian Brothers Montgomery

text: I arrived promptly at my appointment time of 8:30am. I didn't leave until 11:44am. Over 3 hours for an oil change and rear brakes. Absolutely unacceptable.

text: Everyone was very nice and said hello. Also explained where the refreshments were. Recommend. If you need/used car speech to George Jones, he's very nice.

name: Michelle Chestnut
text: I was there for an interview. Some people were a little " dry " and seemed too busy to bother with me. I felt out of place so I didn't even do the interview. Maybe if I was a customer I'd have been less of a problem for the desk guy  walking through the door. I saw a lot of people just relaxing on the phone up front so it seemed the ones in the back and outside were actually working. So see for yourself how you like it this is just my 1st and more than likely last experience at this place.
